title: Croatia : Number of road deaths 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of fatalities, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2008.
But, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This statistic illustrates the number of road traffic fatalities per year in Croatia between 2006 and 2018 . In the period of consideration , road fatalities presented an overall trend of decline . The year with the lowest amount of fatalities was 2016 , with a total of 207 road traffic fatalities in Croatia .
